channel.title: Project Forever [pi] 317
channel.description:
This is a new project i will be working on and hopefully it will be really good and people will enjoy it.. ---------------------Things i have already finished--------------------- -fully working newcomers map -melle,mage,range gear shops -main ladders/doors working -information on a quest interface -all emotes work properly now just like runescape -made a donorzone -added primal armour -added korasis sword ---------------------My goals for this server--------------------- -make fully working party chest atm 20% complete -make warning sign appear when entering wildy 0% -load real gwd maps 0% -add more donor features 50% -add pvp zones in some citys 0% -refine some noncombat skills 40% [size=18pt]PICTURES[/size] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/b6sq48.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2cwqwd5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/anyfys.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/axlb8m.png[/img]

item.title: Project Forever [pi] 317

item.title: Project Forever [pi] 317
item.dc:creator: @tehsandbox tehsandbox
item.description:
@tehsandbox wrote:

This is a new project i will be working on and hopefully it will be really good and people will enjoy it…
---------------------Things i have already finished---------------------
-fully working newcomers map
-melle,mage,range gear shops
-main ladders/doors working
-information on a quest interface
-all emotes work properly now just like runescape
-made a donorzone
-added primal armour
-added korasis sword
---------------------My goals for this server---------------------
-make fully working party chest atm 20% complete
-make warning sign appear when entering wildy 0%
-load real gwd maps 0%
-add more donor features 50%
-add pvp zones in some citys 0%
-refine some noncombat skills 40%
